panels.visual: Party descending into Elven Sanctum Cavern of quiet grandeur Colored glows everywhere - emerald, silver-blue, lavender, golden, prismatic Orrery at center - magnificent crystal and metal structure Lenses suspended in air Lord Alric on raised dais with drow conspirators Dramatic lighting from above Lord Alric: "Ah. The meddlers arrive. Too late, I'm afraid."
Close on Lord Alric's sneering face Holding forged key
panels.dialogue: Alric: "For a century, this citadel has been wasted on peasants and merchants. The power here belongs to those who understand it!"

panels.visual: Alric gesturing to Orrery Crude lenses visible in wrong positions
panels.dialogue: Alric: "The high elves hoarded this power. Now it's mine to command!"
Pocky: "You're corrupting the essences! You'll destroy Everpeak!" Alric: "Destroy? No. RESHAPE!"
